text: A view of Pallimas Valley The Pallimas Valley Urdu (وادی پلیماس) Sindhi (وادي پلیماس) is a valley in Wadh Tesil, nearby Wadh town of Khuzdar District, Balochistan, a western province of Pakistan.The Kunj and other hill torrents flow from mountainous area towards the valley. The ancient inscriptions and Tharia Cave Paintings have been explored in the vicinity of this valley as well. Maney historical and archaeological sites are located in valley which possibly are the period of Nal Civilisation of Nall, Pakistan ==Gallery== File:The most beautiful Valley of Pallimas.jpg|A beautiful view of Pallimas valley File:The Pallimas Valley of Pakistan.jpg|Pallimas Valley File:The Pallimas Valley Balochistan Pakistan.jpg|The view of vale of Pallimas File:The Pallimas Valley Wadh Balochistan.jpg|A wonderful view of Pallimas Valley == References == Category:Tourism in Pakistan Category:Valleys of Pakistan
title: Pallimas Valley
